projects.title: Executive Board Pack Generator
projects.description: Unified master-file that pulls raw data from 3 departmental CSVs to generate print-ready weekly board meeting visuals automatically.

projects.title: Auto-Invoicing Dispatcher
projects.description: Script monitoring a Sheet for approved orders. Automatically generates PDF invoices, saves to Drive, and emails the client with specific attachments.

projects.title: Company SOP Digital Hub
projects.description: Transitioned client from static PDF manuals to an interactive, searchable digital knowledge base for employee onboarding and reference.

projects.title: Expense Approval System
projects.description: Multi-stage approval system where form submissions trigger Slack alerts to managers. Approvals deduct from budget in real-time.

projects.title: CEO Calendar Protocol
projects.description: A rigid scheduling system ensuring every meeting invite includes a mandatory pre-read link, objective summary, and priority tag.

projects.title: Executive KPI Dashboard
projects.description: Built an executive-facing dashboard to track throughput, backlog, SLA risk, and weekly priorities with automated refresh and stakeholder-ready summaries.
impact: Reduced manual rollups and status chasing

projects.techStack: Google Sheets • Query Language • Data Validation
projects.title: Integrated FMCG Distribution ERP
projects.description: Zero-code relational ERP system for high-volume wholesale distribution. Unified ecosystem where single order entry updates inventory, dealer ledgers, and dispatch documentation simultaneously.

projects.techStack: Google Sheets • Relational Schema • Data Validation
projects.title: Medical Operations Control System
projects.description: Zero-cost ERP architecture for medical tourism, stabilizing patient workflows, visa gating, and commission reconciliation. Unified 3,000+ active cases into a single governed ledger.

projects.title: Weekly Finance Close Control System
projects.description: Logic-gated finance close system eliminating version drift and reducing reporting risk through forced reconciliation checkpoints. No data proceeds without validation.
